sentences.chinese: 六月，侯勝嗣，五年，天漢二年薨，制所幸封，不得嗣。
sentences.literal: Sixth month, Marquis Sheng succeeded, five years, Tianhan second year died, imperial edict favored enfeoffment, could not succeed.
sentences.idiomatic: In the sixth month, Marquis Sheng succeeded him. After five years, in the second year of Tianhan, he died. By imperial edict he was favored with enfeoffment, but could not be succeeded.

sentences.chinese: 以朝鮮王子漢兵圍朝鮮降侯。
sentences.literal: As Korean prince Han troops surrounded Korean surrendered marquis.
sentences.idiomatic: As Korean prince, when Han troops surrounded Korean he surrendered and was made marquis.

sentences.chinese: 三年癸未封，六年，使朝鮮，謀反，格死。
sentences.literal: Third year guiwei day enfeoffed, six years, sent to Korean, plotted rebellion, resisted died.
sentences.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guiwei day of the third year. After six years, when sent to Korean, he plotted rebellion and was killed while resisting.

sentences.chinese: 以父朝鮮相路人，漢兵至，首先降，道死，子侯。
三月壬寅封，五年，太初元年薨，亡後。
以貳師將軍擊大宛斬王，侯，八千戶。
太初四年四月丁巳封，十一年，延和三年，擊匈奴兵敗，降。
以貳師將軍騎士斬郁成王首，侯。
